name: Matrix Tetris
description:
A simple Tetris clone in the style of The Matrix movies. The game gets harder the longer you surivive, so see how far you can get and check out a little surprise if you get a Tetris.

UNIVERSITY OF CHESTER PROJECT DETAILS

This game was created by a single Level 6 student for a final year module that focuses on Unreal Engine C++ programming. Students are tasked with recreating Tetris and adding their own spin to the game either visually or through new mechanics.

CONTROLS

  • A - Move left
  • D - Move right
  • W - Rotate piece
  • S - Move the piece down more quickly
  • R - Restart the game

REQUIREMENTS

  • Windows PC

TEAM MEMBERS

  • 1 x Level 6 student

COURSE DETAILS

The work presented here is that of our students. Although the page is run by the University of Chester, views in the games do not necessarily represent those of the University of Chester.
